name: smash game show
description:
I hope you have played smash tv. If not, this is meant to be better. Not better in every way, but i do plan to make it big and good if i can. Top down arcade game. There will be updates in the future. Last updated 9/10/2017. New music and content. Terribly sorry if you downloaded a flawed version of the game.

Now the game is in .exe format and needs no installer.

ASDW or direction keys for movement.

Left click for projectile weapons. Right click for special weapons.
